Fancy Things

29 Jun 2015

You can do all sorts of fancy stuff, like write the TI-Schrodinger equation:

And write bits of code:

def print_hi(name)
  puts "Hi, #{name}"
end
print_hi('Tom')
#=> prints 'Hi, Tom' to STDOUT.
